nodes.text: Nari Sable was a female human who was a friend of Lyra Erso. Nari accompanied Lyra and her daughter Jyn to research kyber crystals on the Outer Rim world Alpinn. Nari was Lyra's maid of honor at her wedding and made Alderaan her home during the Clone Wars. She was a skilled athlete, participating in gymnastics and running. Like Lyra, Nari was a believer in the Force.
